Yay, I feel like a good leader now :-)

To everyone: my hands are killing me again, so expect short posts and such.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::The Destrocons:::
> 
> Skywarp: Coward!
> Dirge: I can take this heat- owww!
> ::Ramjet had punched him::
> Ramjet: he is our leader. If he thinks that we are at a tactical 
> disadvantage, which we ARE at, he has the right ot order a retreat.
> Skywarp: I still think that Shredder was a better leader.
> Ramjet: Shut up, and let's get out of here before we're all killed.
> ::They transform and head back to the Syria base::
